about_the_game:
This add-on is about the Renault Agora bus. It was manufactured by Renault from 1995 to 2002 and is a symbol of urban public transport in many countries. Designed to meet the dynamic needs of cities, the bus embodies the perfect balance between functionality, comfort and efficiency.

Elegant design: with its modern and dynamic lines, the Agora offers an elegant exterior design that blends harmoniously into the urban landscape. Its compact dimensions and agility make it the ideal choice for navigating busy streets.

Versatile capacity: available in standard and articulated versions, the Agora offers versatile capacity to meet the changing passenger needs in urban environments. Whether for rush hour or quieter times, the Agora can be easily adapted to the situation.

Improved access: thanks to its wide doors and low floor, the Agora offers improved accessibility for passengers with reduced mobility, making it easier for them to board.

An urban legend: During its production period, the Agora became a legend and was appreciated by both drivers and passengers for its reliability and innovative design.

Reliable performance: equipped with engines tailored to the needs of the city, the Renault Agora combines power and energy efficiency.

Plunge into the middle of the urban hustle and bustle with the Renault Agora DLC for OMSI 2. Explore the narrow streets, master the challenges of traffic and feel the adrenaline of rush hour - all with the comfort of your passengers in mind.

Whether you choose the standard model or articulated bus, the Agora offers you the perfect balance of modern design, performance, reliability and optimal accessibility. Drive this legendary bus in OMSI 2 now!

Features:
  • Solo and articulated bus versions
  • Various door layouts
  • Authentic sounds
  • Detailed driver workstation
  • Maxol ticket printer
  • Maxol PILOT matrix controller
  • EURO2 engines
  • ZF 4 speed transmission
  • Various repaints are included
  • Repaint templates are included
  • SETVAR list for different settings included

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core, e.g. Core i5 with 2.8 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 1,024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
